text: José Rodolfo Alfaro Vargas (born 18 March 2000) is a Costa Rican professional footballer who plays for Saprissa on loan from A.D. Carmelita in the Costa Rican Liga FPD. Alfaro made his debut for the senior Costa Rica national football team at the Avaya Stadium on the 2 February 2019 against the United States. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Costa Rican footballers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:Costa Rica international footballers
title: José Alfaro (football)
